welcome_message: Welcome to MLOps Stacks. For detailed information on project generation, see the README at https://github.com/databricks/mlops-stacks/blob/main/README.md.

input_project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Project name must be at least 3 characters long and cannot contain the following characters: "\", "/", " " and ".".

input_root_dir.description:
Root directory name.
For monorepos, name of the root directory that contains all the projects.
Default

input_databricks_staging_workspace_host.description:
URL of staging Databricks workspace,
It will run PR CI and preview changes before they're deployed to production.
Default
input_databricks_staging_workspace_host.pattern_match_failure_message: Databricks staging workspace host URLs must start with https. Got invalid workspace host.

input_databricks_prod_workspace_host.description:
URL of production Databricks workspace.
Default
input_databricks_prod_workspace_host.pattern_match_failure_message: Databricks production workspace host URLs must start with https. Got invalid workspace host.

input_default_branch.description:
Name of the default branch,
Staging resources are deployed from this branch and stages the latest ML code.
Default

input_release_branch.description:
Name of the release branch.
The training and other production jobs pull ML code from this branch.
Default

input_read_user_group.description:
User group name to give READ permissions to for project resources
(ML jobs, integration test job runs, and machine learning resources).
A group with this name must exist in both the staging and prod workspaces.
Default

input_include_models_in_unity_catalog.description: Whether to use the Model Registry with Unity Catalog

input_staging_catalog_name.description:
Name of the catalog in Unity Catalog that will host the staging UC resources. 
This catalog must already exist and service principals must have access to it.
Default

input_prod_catalog_name.description:
Name of the catalog in Unity Catalog that will host the production UC resources.
This catalog must already exist and service principals must have access to it.
Default

input_test_catalog_name.description:
Name of the catalog in Unity Catalog that will be used for integration tests.
This catalog must already exist and service principals must have access to it.
Default

input_schema_name.description:
Name of schema to use when registering a model in Unity Catalog.
This schema must already exist and service principals must have access.
We recommend using the project name.
Default
input_schema_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Valid schema names cannot contain any of the following characters: " ", ".", "-", "\", "/"

input_unity_catalog_read_user_group.description:
User group name to give EXECUTE privileges to models in Unity Catalog (UC).
It must exist in UC with access granted to the staging and prod workspaces.
Default

input_inference_table_name.description:
Fully qualified name of inference table to attach monitoring to.
This table must already exist and service principals must have access.
input_inference_table_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Fully qualified Unity Catalog table names must have catalog, schema, and table separated by "." and each cannot contain any of the following characters: " ", ".", "-", "\", "/"

success_message:
*** Your MLOps Stack has been created in the '{{.input_root_dir}}{{if not (eq .input_setup_cicd_and_project `CICD_Only`) }}/{{.input_project_name}}{{end}}' directory! ***

Please refer to the README.md for further instructions on getting started.
